DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety blood level new pediatric formulation Famvir child 1-12 year age . In Part A , patient receive single dose famciclovir ( 12.5 mg/kg ) ass pharmacokinetics ( PK ) safety . In Part B , patient receive multiple dos famciclovir alone concomitant oral anti-herpes therapy ass safety tolerability . Part B start PK data Part A analyzed .
